name: Become a Guardian Angel
description:
Shit, you died. But not because you *died*, rather because some one killed you. An angel. He needed a break so you need to replace him for a while.

For five minut, you'll have to switch between the dimensions, going into: 
- the normal plan to embody and help the living;

- the hell and scout for the evil spirits

- the heaven to scout the living and move freely 

Maintain peace, save people, prevent inevitable deaths: become a guardian angel
